remarks.format: ## Remarks 该数字对应的顺序为文档中的控件： 第一个书签的 1，2 代表第二个，依次类推。The number corresponds to the order of the control in the document: 1 for the first bookmark, 2 for the second one, and so on. 如果删除其中一个书签，则的其他书签将相应地重新编号。If one of the bookmarks is deleted, then the of the other bookmarks will renumber accordingly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到文档，然后在文档中显示的书签的位置，通过显示消息框中。The following code example adds a control to the document and then displays the position of the bookmark in the document by showing the in a message box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 之后控件处于折叠状态、 开始和结束点是否相等。After a control is collapsed, the starting and ending points are equal. 如果您使用折叠控制整个段落，范围是指位于之后结束的段落标记 （下一段落开头）。If you use to collapse a control that refers to an entire paragraph, the range is located after the ending paragraph mark (the beginning of the next paragraph). 但是，您可以移动范围使用备份一个字符方法的系列之后控件处于折叠状态。However, you can move the range back one character by using the method after the range of the control is collapsed. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加文本，然后显示该书签的前后放置的开始和结束折叠书签后，使用的控件。The following code example adds a control with text, and then displays the start and end position of the bookmark before and after collapsing the bookmark. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 避免在您的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications. 如果在过程中需要使用密码，请求用户密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code. 避免使用内置的系统管理员 (sa) 登录帐户。Avoid using the built-in system administrator (sa) logon account. 相反，让系统管理员 sysadmin 固定的服务器角色的成员，让他们使用其自己的帐户登录。Instead, make system administrators members of the sysadmin fixed server role, and have them use their own accounts to log on. 只有在没有其他方式登录时，请使用 sa。Use sa only when there is no other way to log on. 若要防止未经授权的访问通过 sa 登录帐户，应将该帐户分配唯一的强密码。To prevent unauthorized access through the sa logon account, you should assign that account a strong, unique password. 如果可能，请使用 Windows 身份验证 （也称为可信连接），可使用 Windows 用户帐户来连接到 SQL Server。When possible, use Windows Authentication (also referred to as a trusted connection), which uses a Windows user account to connect to SQL Server. 当用户通过 Windows 用户帐户，SQL Server 使用的信息在 Windows 操作系统中以验证帐户名和密码。When a user connects through a Windows user account, SQL Server uses information in the Windows operating system to validate the account name and password. 可以使用 Windows 身份验证之前，服务器管理员必须配置 SQL Server 以使用这种模式的身份验证。Before you can use Windows Authentication, a server administrator must configure SQL Server to use this mode of authentication. 如果 Windows 身份验证不可用，避免保存用户的登录信息。If Windows Authentication is not available, avoid saving users' logon information. 它是更安全的用户输入他们每次登录的时的登录信息。It is more secure for users to enter their logon information each time they log on. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 此示例将插入到 Microsoft Excel 电子表格控件。This example inserts a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet into the control. 样式值 (191) 为数字 1、 2、 4、 8、 16、 32 和 128 的组合。The Style value (191) is a combination of the numbers 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, and 128. 此示例假定您的名为工作簿`Data.xlsx`工作表上保存到具有至少两个数据行的 C 目录的根目录。This example assumes you have a workbook named `Data.xlsx` saved to the root of the C directory with at least two rows of data on the worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加控制文档，然后将第一个段落的文本在书签中从繁体中文转换为简体中文，反之亦然。The following code example adds a control to the first paragraph in the document and then converts the text in the bookmark from Traditional Chinese to Simplified Chinese or vice versa. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordBookmark#110](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordBookMark/CS/Trin_WordBookMark.cs#110)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordBookmark#110](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordBookMark/VB/ThisDocument.vb#110)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text in the control.

value.span: 控件的文本。

span.span: The text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回该书签的普通的未格式化的文本。The property returns the plain, unformatted text of the bookmark. 当设置此属性的文本控件被替换。When you set this property, the text of the control is replaced. 设置属性不会删除书签。Setting the property does not delete the bookmark. 设置一个书签，用于跨多个表格单元格的属性将在第一个单元格内设置的文本。Setting the property of a bookmark that spans multiple table cells will set the text within the first cell only. 如果该书签将包含整个表和周围的文本，将删除整个表。If the bookmark contains the entire table and surrounding text, the entire table will be deleted. 有关设置信息属性的一个书签，用于重叠另一个书签，请参阅[书签控件](/visualstudio/vsto/bookmark-control.md)。For information about setting the property of a bookmark that overlaps another bookmark, see [Bookmark Control](/visualstudio/vsto/bookmark-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加一个带有文本，然后使用在书签中显示的字符总数方法。The following code example adds a control with text and then displays the total number of characters in the bookmark using the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordBookmark#15](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordBookMark/CS/Trin_WordBookMark.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordBookmark#15](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordBookMark/VB/ThisDocument.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合仅包含表格的上下文的范围中最外层嵌套级别控件。This method returns a collection containing only those tables at the outermost nesting level within the context of the range of the control. 这些表不能在最外层嵌套级别在整个设置的嵌套表。These tables may not be at the outermost nesting level within the entire set of nested tables. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加控件到文档中的表，然后将该表粘贴，作为嵌套表，对第三个单元格。The following code example adds a control to the table in the document, then pastes the table, as a nested table, to the third cell. 然后，该代码在书签中选择下一个表。The code then selects the next table in the bookmark. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization.
